reviewText: Some of us in the US would like to purchase this ... why can't this series be included on Region 1???
A really wonderful British series starring Penelope Keith and Peter Bowles. I was thrilled to receive series 1-3 as a Christmas present.  Clear picture and sound,  would buy from this seller again.

I have loved this series since PBS ran it back in the 90's. Having a region free dvd player has allowed me to enjoy the entire series again.
A very cute story about Caroline Fairchild wanting to get back into publishing after 20 years of raising a family. Her husband, Donald has just started work at Oasis Publishing. Not wanting to give away any of the story. Donald and Caroline find themselves both working at Oasis. Caroline, using her maiden name of Fielding, is now Donald's Editorial editor. Of course, because of company policy, married couples cannot work together. There is the basis for the series.
